articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with War Veterans and Commanding Officers Who Participated in Military Parade
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with War Veterans and Commanding Officers Who Participated in Military Parade
Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with war veterans and commanding officers who took part in the military parade held in celebration of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Ri Yong Gil, Mun Kyong Dok and O Il Jong. 
					
					He warmly congratulated the war veterans and commanding officers on their contribution to glorifying the immortal exploits Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory and feats Generalissimo Kim Jong Il performed by steering the Songun revolution to victory by taking part in the military parade. They fully demonstrated the spirit of Songun Korea winning shining victories in the struggle for national reunification and building a thriving socialist nation and great national power through the military parade.
					
					He had a photo session with them after expressing belief that they would add glory to the proud history of victory in the war by wining a fresh victory in the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation in the same heroic fighting spirit as displayed in the 1950s.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Switzerland
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Ueli Maurer, president of Switzerland, on the occasion of its national day.
					The message extended congratulations and greetings to the president and people of Switzerland.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Macedonia
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Macedonia
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Gjorgje Ivanov, president of Macedonia, on its national day.
					Kim in his message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, sincerely wishing Macedonia steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Macedonia
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Macedonia
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Friday sent a message of greeting to Prime Minister of Macedonia ï¼®ikola Gruevski on the occasion of its national day.
					The message wished the prime minister and government of Macedonia successes in the work for the development and prosperity of the country and expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow strong in line with the common interests and desire of the two peoples.
					
					That day DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Macedonian counterpart Nikola Poposki.

articles.title: Brazilian Political Party Calls for Stronger Friendly, Cooperative Ties with WPK
articles.content:
Brazilian Political Party Calls for Stronger Friendly, Cooperative Ties with WPK
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Ri Hwa Gun, DPRK ambassador to Brazil, paid a farewell call on Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres, national president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, on July 24.
					At the meeting the party leader said:
					
					I highly appreciate the successes made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people in the socialist construction and in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle for national reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					It is a great encouragement to our party that the WPK and the Korean people had access to powerful nuclear deterrent and are winning one victory after another in the struggle against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					It is the consistent stand of our party to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK.
					
					I hope that the ties between the two parties will continue favorably developing in the days ahead.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Guinean President
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message from Guinean President Alpha Conde on July 26.
					In the message the Guinean president extended warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the Guinean government and people and on his own behalf on the significant 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					The message noted that the Korean people's historic victory in the war marked an event specially recorded in the history of the DPRK.
					
					The Guinean president reaffirmed his firm will to make efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					He sent the best wishes for Kim Jong Un's good health and the Korean people's peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Chadian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Chadian President
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, on July 25 received a message of greeting from Chadian  President Idriss Deby Itno.
					In the message the Chadian president, on behalf of the government and people of Chad and on his own behalf, extended sincerest and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War and wished him good health and happiness and all Korean people prosperity.
					
					He reiterated his firm will to make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and the two peoples.
					
					The Chadian president once again sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and pleasant holiday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from President of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from President of Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, on July 25 received a message from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of Democratic Congo.
					In the message the president, on behalf of all the people of Democratic Congo and on his own behalf, extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					He reaffirmed his will to boost the bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					He wished Kim Jong Un happiness, prosperity and good health.

articles.title: Foreign Campers Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Campers Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Campers from other countries who came to participate in the 28th Songdowon International Children's Camping visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday.
					Visiting the old home in Mangyongdae where Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood, nurturing the noble will for revolution, they went round with keen interest historic relics preserved there with great care.
					
					They also looked round revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill. 
					
					Alexei Morozov, head of the Russian campers group (Khabarovsk), said: 
					
					Mangyongdae is a holy land where the great sun rose. Kim Il Sung was born at the low-roofed thatched house and grew up, receiving revolutionary education from his parents.
					
					He liberated the country and made a great contribution to accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					His feats will shine forever.

articles.title: Lao Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Lao Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos led by Chairman Phandoaungchit Vongsa arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the China Institute of International Studies led by Vice President Guo Xiangang left here for home by air on Friday.

articles.title: Foreign Party Delegations and Delegates Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Party Delegations, Delegates Leave
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) and a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Portugal left here by air on Friday after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					Departing here earlier were the delegation of the Communist Party of Viet Nam, delegation of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, delegation of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), delegation of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), delegation of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, delegation of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of Democratic Congo, delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, delegation of the Communist Party of Belarus, delegation of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), delegation of the Socialist Workers' Party of United States of America, delegation of the Workers' World Party of the United States of America, delegation of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), delegate of the Communist Party of Germany, executive president of the Central Executive Co
					
					mmittee and member of the Standing Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party,  secretary of the Sverdlovsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the delegate of the Finnish CommunistsâLeague.

articles.title: Namibian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Namibian Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A Namibian government delegation led by Nambahu Thomas Tommy, vice-minister of Justice, left here by air on Friday after participating in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Participants in WHO South-East Asia Regional Technical Consultation on Telemedicine Leave
articles.content:
Participants in Technical Consultation on Telemedicine Leave
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The participants in the WHO South-East Asia Regional Technical Consultation on Telemedicine left here by air on Friday.

articles.title: Delegations of Overseas Koreans Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Overseas Koreans Leave
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The delegation of educational workers of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, delegation of officials of the Korean Educational Association in Japan, delegation of officials of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan and the delegation of the European region for implementing the June 15 joint declaration left here on Friday by air after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					Departing here earlier were the delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Canada and the delegation of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan.
					
					Meanwhile, family of Wang Xiaoming, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and family of Ri Jae Dok, a Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China, left here on Friday by train.

articles.title: Meeting of Media Persons Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Media Persons Held
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Media persons had a meeting here with Song Hak Yong, former war correspondent of Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Song took part in different battles despite a hail of bullets and shells during the past Fatherland Liberation War and conducted brisk news coverage on the front.
					
					He took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War and received deep loving care from Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					At the meeting Song said that the war correspondents, each  holding a writing brush in one hand and a rifle in the other, successfully carried out their duty in various battles to report the feats performed by the soldiers of the Korean People's Army for the party, the leader, the country and its people.
					
					The great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il showed great benevolence for the war correspondents who performed feats in the Fatherland Liberation War while dynamically conducting news coverage in the battle fields, he noted.
					
					He requested media persons to make uninterrupted innovations in news coverage true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					Singing wartime song "Song of National Defence" together with Song Hak Yong, the participants in the meeting renewed their resolution to learn from the fighting spirit and traits of the war correspondents and dynamically conduct press activities for encouraging all the service personnel and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently issued new postage stamps (four individual stamps and one sheetlet) featuring monumental edifices of the Songun (military-first) era.
					Individual stamps carry pictures of Changjon Street and People's Theater located in the heart of the capital city of Pyongyang as well as Ryugyong Health Complex on the bank of the Taedong River and Rungna Dolphinarium on Rungna Islet in the river.
					
					The sheetlet shows the Pyongyang Folklore Park, built in September last year to introduce the 5,000-year-long history and culture of the Korean nation.
					
					Meanwhile, two kinds of round stamps dealing with Rangifer tarandus (Linne) and Aptenodytes exceisior Mathews etlrdale were brought out.

articles.title: Participants in Technical Consultation on Telemedicine Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Participants in Technical Consultation on Telemedicine Tour Pyongyang
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The participants in WHO South-East Asia Regional Technical Consultation on Telemedicine visited the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital here on Friday.
					They looked round various places of the institute, a modern medical service center for women. 
					
					They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, etc.

articles.title: New Liver Medicines Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Liver Medicines Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Biochemical Institute at University of Science in the DPRK developed protoporphyrin injection and capsule highly efficacious for liver protection and treatment.
					The injection has been confirmed in practice to be very effective for curing acute and chronic hepatitis, liver cirrhosis, fatty liver and other liver diseases and recovering liver function. 
					
					Protoporphyrin, containing hemoglobin, myoglobin and catalase, is a natural bio-product which helps improve function of liver and protect it through activation of metabolism, detoxification and antioxidation and improvement of immunity.
					
					The scientists established the way of manufacturing this bio-product with animal blood and verified its physicochemical quality and biological effect.
					
					The injection and capsule won a high appreciation at various sci-tech festivals and exhibitions.

articles.title: Japan's War Criminal Enterprise Urged to Make Reparation
articles.content:
Japan's War Criminal Enterprise Urged to Make Reparation
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Citizens Council with Grand Mothers of "the Volunteers Corps" and the Mutual Aid Association for Victims of Crimes of the Japanese Imperialists issued a joint statement on July 30 demanding a Japanese war criminal enterprise make a reparation for the past crimes.
					The statement recalled that the Pusan High Court ruled that day that the Mitsubishi Heavy Industries of Japan should make reparation to the victims who were taken to Japan for forced labor under the rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					The victims have long sued the Japanese enterprise for damages but it has insisted that it is not obliged to make any reparation.
					
					The Japanese enterprise should abandon the right of final appeal related to the recent judgment, said the statement.
					
					The statement urged the south Korean "government" to take a necessary measure.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an article to the 39th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us Accelerate Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism by Fundamentally Improving Party Work".
					Kim Jong Il comprehensively indicated the idea and theory on building a revolutionary party of Juche type and developed the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into an invincible party imbued with the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The single-minded unity based on one center and the monolithic ideology is the political philosophy the WPK has considered as the mainstay of revolution for decades. There is no such revolutionary party in the world as the WPK which has won only victories, holding the great leaders as the center of unity and leadership and thoroughly establishing the monolithic ideological system and leadership system of the party.
					
					The most transparent ideological purity, organizational integrity and unity in action -- this is the revolutionary appearance of the WPK guided by the dear respected Kim Jong Un. All the party members constitute shields and fortresses devotedly defending the Party Central Committee as comrades-in-arms of Kim Jong Un. His plan and determination serve as the fixed will of all party organizations and members and guidelines for their action. Strong sense of organization and discipline has been thoroughly established in the whole party, and all party organizations and members are thinking and acting as guided by the idea and purpose of the leader. This is the real picture of the WPK.
					
					It is the steadfast will of all party members, service personnel and other people to dynamically push forward the drive to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, just as they made persistent efforts, regarding the modeling of whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme platform of the party under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Advancing in Spirit of Victors
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Advancing in Spirit of Victors
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially calls upon all the Koreans to get single-mindedly united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, glorify the ideas and feats of the great Generalissimos and working hard for the final victory in building a thriving nation.
					The editorial goes on:
					
					The 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was celebrated with splendor as a great auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of the nation thanks to high political enthusiasm of the entire party, the whole country and all the people and the deep concern of the progressive people around the world.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are advancing toward a great victory, tightly holding the banner of uninterrupted revolution and baton of the victory handed down by the generation who won a victory in the war in the great annals.
					
					The outstanding leadership of the great party indicates the road of the DPRK, the unbreakable single-minded unity puts spurs to the offensive speed of Songun Korea and the July 27 March is reverberating far and wide as a dynamic one of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					The victors' faith in Songun Korea represents an unwavering confidence that it can beat any strong army by dint of the army-people unity, the great pride in the powerful capability for self-defense and the strong will of successors to carry forward the mental power of the great annals as an ever-victorious treasured sword.
					
					The DPRK is sure to win as long as there are the solid foundation for winning victory provided by the great Generalissimos, the tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the single-minded unity around by the party.
					
					The editorial calls for putting new spurs to the building of a thriving nation and achieving greater victory on all fronts with the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war celebrated as a grand festival of victors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes Danger of U.S. Moves for Massive Arms Sale
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes Danger of U.S. Moves for Massive Arms Sale
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- In March last the U.S. administration decided to transfer the right to control the export of war supplies or products of dual use to the Department of Commerce, not to the Department of State.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					This was a step taken to help U.S. munitions enterprises sell weapons to other countries with greater ease.
					
					The U.S. economy has been militarized to the maximum, along with many wars of aggression. In this course the political circles and munitions industry have been tied closer and politicians are playing into the hands of munitions enterprises.
					
					If the munitions industry gets weak, the overall economy is shaking to its very foundation. If politicians are out of favor with munitions monopoly businessmen, their fate becomes just like a dog without master. 
					
					The U.S. administration is keen to help the munitions enterprises explore overseas markets in a bid to tide over the economic crisis and bring greater profits to munitions monopoly businessmen.
					
					The U.S. is expanding arms sale not merely in quest of its economic interests. It is chiefly aimed to make the buyers of U.S. made arms dependent on it militarily and put relevant regions under its military control. Herein lies the danger of the U.S. moves for arms sale.
					
					Through arms sale the U.S. is barring its buyers from attaining self-reliance in national defence.
					
					Such moves of the U.S. are sparking off worldwide arms race. Many countries are allotting not a small part of state funds as military spending for keeping military balance.
					
					The U.S. is, indeed, a special-class war criminal state having a bad habit of drawing water to its mill by inflicting pain upon the world people through the escalation of the tension and wars of aggression. It will have to pay a dear price one day for its dangerous arms sale.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces Urged to Settle IS's Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces Urged to Settle IS's Case
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an article on July 31 denouncing the puppet ruling forces for covering up the illegal interference in the election.
					The article said:
					
					There is no progress in the state investigation for probing the truth behind the interference of the Intelligence Service (IS) in the election because of the "Saenuri Party's" moves to derail the investigation.
					
					The party absurdly insisted on the issue irrelevant to the state investigation into the case as soon as it started. Finally, the party went the lengths of shamelessly behaving, opening to public even the minutes of the south-north summit.
					
					The ruling forces are attempting to cover up the investigation into the case in a cunning method but they can never deceive the people.
					
					The people see through the artifice of the ruling forces to gloss over the IS's and the police's organized interference in the election.
					
					The ruling forces can never calm down public anger by raising the issue of abusing "the right" of a woman staff member of the IS and pretending to hear a testimony from a few witnesses.  Now is the time to take a decisive action for the settlement of the IS's interference in the election.
					
					It is necessary to probe the truth and punish those involved in the case.
					
					To this end, Nam Jae Jun, director of the IS, should step down and the "president" make an apology.
					
					The ruling forces should no longer try to conceal the IS case but opt to settle it.

articles.title: Earthquakes Occur in Waters off S. Korean City
articles.content:
Earthquakes Occur in Waters off S. Korean City
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Earthquakes repeatedly occurred in the waters 42 km southwest of Poryong City, South Chungchong Province, according to south Korean KBS on Thursday.
					From the evening of July 31 to August 1, earthquakes measuring 2.2-3.0 degrees on the Richter scale occurred four times in the above-said waters in the West Sea of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Day of Victory in War Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Day of Victory in War Observed in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Russia, Ukraine and Moldova on July 26 and 27 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					Public figures and other people of those countries attended the meetings.
					
					The chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism praised President Kim Il Sung for leading the army and people of the DPRK to victory in the war against the U.S. imperialists' aggression.
					
					The chairman of the Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					The Korean war was the fatherland liberation war for the Korean people in every aspect.
					
					The U.S. imperialists started the Korean war.
					
					The military wisdom and Juche-based war methods of great brilliant commander Kim Il Sung and heroism of the army and people were the source of the DPRK's victory.
					
					Its victory in the war made a great contribution to ensuring global peace and security.
					
					The chairman of the Moldovan Songun Youth Union for the Study of the Juche Idea praised the President for shattering the U.S. imperialists' myth of "mightiness" for the first time in history and brought about the beginning of decline for the U.S.
					
					Messages to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Russia and Moldova.

articles.title: DPRK's Day of Victory in War Marked in Cambodia, India
articles.content:
DPRK's Day of Victory in War Marked in Cambodia, India
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- There took place various events in Cambodia and India on July 21 and 23 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					A seminar on President Kim Il Sung's exploits was held by the Khmer Democratic Party in Cambodia and a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film shows were held by the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il and the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics.
					
					Participants in the film shows watched a Korean film censuring the U.S. imperialists for unleashing the Korean war.
					
					Ouk Phurik, president of the Khmer Democratic Party in Cambodia, praised Kim Il Sung as an iron-willed brilliant commander who led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					Under his wise leadership the Korean people achieved great successes in their efforts for the prosperity of the country and national reunification, he noted.
					
					S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, said July 27 is the day the U.S., the provoker of the war,  signed the Armistice Agreement which is little short of an instrument of surrender. 
					
					It was thanks to Kim Il Sung that the DPRK could beat back the invasion by the U.S. and its allies and win in the war, he noted.
					
					Sadhna Harish, chairwoman of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics, said the myth of U.S. "mightiness" was shattered in the Fatherland Liberation War by invincible and iron-willed commander Kim Il Sung.
					
					After the war the U.S. has persisted in its provocations against the DPRK, instead of drawing a due lesson from the Korean war, she said, adding: 
					
					But each time it was compelled to send a letter of apology to the Korean people who were under the outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Kim Il Sung's such military exploits will go down in the world history of anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					A message of greeting to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held by the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Day of Victory in War Marked by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
DPRK's Day of Victory in War Marked by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held an event at the Korean Centre on July 27, the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, said in his speech that the Korean people's victory in the war was a victory of the outstanding military idea, strategy and tactics of the President and a victory of the single-minded unity of the service personnel and people around their party and leader.
					
					He went on:
					
					The U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world desperately tried to occupy the whole of Korea by hurling even troops from their satellite countries into the war. However, they couldn't break the will of the Korean people to devotedly defend the beloved country, remaining loyal to the leader.
					
					As long as there are the invincible army and people led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the DPRK will surely build a thriving nation by foiling the moves of the hostile forces to obstruct it.
					
					The participants looked round photos showing the exploits the President performed by leading the war to the victory, the Songun leadership feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un.
					
					An art performance was given by Korean artistes and a dancing party took place that day.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communist Union, made public a statement on July 26 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					He said:
					
					The young DPRK beat back the invasion by the U.S., the boss of the   imperialists, and its allied forces and emerged victorious. This marked an event of great significance not only in the struggle of the Korean people for freedom and independence but also for the world socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism. 
					
					Six decades have passed since the ceasefire, but peace has not settled on the Korean Peninsula and the U.S. imperialists and their allies have become evermore undisguised in their moves to stifle socialist Korea economically and put it under their  military occupation. 
					
					But the might of socialist Korea has been increased incomparably. 
					
					Under the Songun leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the DPRK has become a world political and military power with tremendous military muscle. 
					
					Another illustrious commander Kim Jong Un is steering the sacred war of the Korean people to protect the security of the country and socialism from the persistent offensive of the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces. 
					
					The DPRK is sure to win a final victory thanks to the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and the single-minded unity of all people united close behind him. 
					
					The U.S. should face up to the situation, give up the attempt to stifle socialist Korea, dismantle the illegal "UN Command" in south Korea and opt for concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Syrian Figure
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Syrian Figure
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Fayez Ismail, general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, issued a statement on July 27, the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The statement said:
					
					July 27, 1953 was the day when the Korean people inflicted a heavy defeat upon the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history and won in the war.
					
					The DPRK had smashed the U.S. moves for aggression in the post-war period, too, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, adding shine to its tradition of invincibility.
					
					It is making a great history by inflicting defeat upon the U.S. imperialists.
					
					The U.S. dares not provoke the DPRK.
					
					It is a great country holding peerlessly great persons in high esteem.
					
					The heroic Korean people trained by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il will always glorify the history of victory.
					
					The Korean people's struggle to achieve greater victory and prosperity under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un is commanding full support and solidarity of the world progressive people including the Syrian people.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Calls for Peace Treaty in Korea
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Calls for Peace Treaty in Korea
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia released a statement "On need to conclude a peace treaty in Korean Peninsula" on July 26, a day before the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					The statement said:
					
					The situation in which the ceasefire, neither peace nor war, has persisted on the Korean Peninsula should not be allowed to go on as it is attributable to the moves of the U.S. to hold supremacy based on a new political strategy. 
					
					For six decades since the ceasefire in the Korean War the DPRK has made persistent efforts to replace the Armistice Agreement by a permanent peace treaty. 
					
					However, the United Nations disregards the DPRK's just efforts, reading the face of the U.S.
					
					The U.S. has ceaselessly escalated the tension by using its lackeys, far from lending ears to the DPRK proposals for peace 
					
					The U.S. has staged unprecedentedly large nuclear war exercises, deliberately straining the situation to such phase as to make sovereign rights of countries to peaceful development of space questionable. 
					
					There is no need for the Korean people to keep the long bankrupt Armistice Agreement.
					
					The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia calls upon the international community to pay attention to the DPRK and Korean people's decades-long proposals for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a durable peace treaty. 
					
					It fully supports the far-sighted foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea led by First Secretary Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits in War Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits in War Praised by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Thailand and Myanmar dedicated special write-ups to the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The July 18 issue of the Thai paper Xing San Daily in its article illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung praised his exploits in war.
					
					The paper lauded the President for liberating Korea by crushing the brigandish Japanese imperialists with his preeminent guerrilla tactics and war methods. 
					
					It went on:
					
					The President humbled the arrogance of the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world in the 1950-1953 Korean war and defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country. The Korean people could win a brilliant victory in the war thanks to the outstanding strategy and tactics and original war methods of Kim Il Sung.
					
					Kim Il Sung successfully led the fierce confrontation with the U.S. imperialists in the postwar period, turning the DPRK into an invulnerable socialist fortress. The immortal military exploits of the peerlessly great man will go down in the world history of anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					The July 19 issue of the Myanmar paper The New Age carried an article accompanied with a photo of the President.
					
					The victory won by the young DPRK in the confrontation with the U.S. and its allied forces was the miracle unprecedented in history, the article said, adding:
					
					It was none other than Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, who worked such unprecedented miracle.
					
					Kim Il Sung encouraged the service personnel and people to defend the country and led them to victory with his rare strategy, tactics and war methods and boundless love and trust.
					
					The paper recalled that famous foreign figures highly praised him as a prominent master of politics and brilliant military strategist.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations posted on internet websites special write-ups between July 21 and 25 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article "Records of revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung for victory in Fatherland Liberation War" illustrated with his photos. 
					
					The article said that in the hard-fought wartime Kim Il Sung shared the destiny with the Korean servicepersons and people while leading the war to victory with distinguished military wisdom, strategy and tactics and warm loving care. 
					
					The President visited every part of the country to powerfully arouse the servicepersons and people to the battle to annihilate the enemies and under his guidance the military operations of the U.S. imperialists were frustrated, it said, adding:
					
					Indeed, the DPRK's victory in the three-year war was the victory of the outstanding idea, strategy and tactics of the President. 
					
					The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, in an article accompanied with photos of Kim Il Sung, deals with the wise leadership the President provided for leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory as a brilliant strategist. 
					
					The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted on its website an article titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President. It also posted on it an article and photos denouncing the atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists during the war. 
					
					Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador and the Ecuadorian Group of the Young Soldiers of Juche posted on their websites an article captioned "How did the Korean War break out" lashing out at the U.S. imperialists for provoking the Korean War.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia on July 25.
					The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to resolutely defend and preserve the idea and feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and eternally glorify them.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo, Handicraft Exhibitions Open Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo, Handicraft Exhibitions Open Abroad
Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Korean book,  photo and handicraft exhibitions opened in Komsomolsk-na-Amure City of Russia, Zlatitsa City of Bulgaria and Pampas City of Peru on July 24 and 26 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					Present at the opening ceremonies were public figures and other people of those countries.
					
					A vice-chairperson of the Komsomolsk-na-Amure City Assembly and other Russian figures said the exhibition offered an opportunity to know better about the developing DPRK and its fine cultural tradition.
					
					They voiced their belief that the Russia-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in the interests of both peoples.
					
					The Zlatitsa mayor said it was the honor for the city to hold the exhibition on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the war. The mayor went on:
					
					The DPRK, a land of morning calm, is widely known to the world for its beautiful natural landscape and independent politics. 
					
					Pyongyang is a city with everything kept neat and tidy and clad in verdure.
					
					I wish the Korean people greater progress in all fabrics of social life.
					
					The Pampas mayor said:
					
					President Kim Il Sung was an outstanding military strategist and a great brilliant commander who crushed the U.S. imperialists and won in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					The Korean people are winning one victory one after another in the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					I wish the DPRK great success in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Suiza
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Suiza
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Confederacion Suiza, Ueli Maurer, con motivo del dia nacional de ese pais europeo.
					El remitente envio felicitacion y saludo al mandatario y pueblo de Suiza.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a presidente de Macedonia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a presidente de Macedonia
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Macedonia, Gjorgje Ivanov, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais.
					El remitente expreso en su misiva la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se desarrollaran favorablemente en el futuro y formulo voto por el incesante desarrollo y prosperidad de Macedonia.

articles.title: Premier coreano aboga por cientifizar produccion de hongos
articles.content:
Premier coreano aboga por cientifizar produccion de hongos
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju recorrio varias fabricas de setas que opera el Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En acato al legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il de alimentar al ejercito y pueblo muchos hongos y al noble proposito del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, el EPC construyo varias fabricas modernas de hongos y amplia sus producciones.
					
					Pasando revista a varios procesos tales como la preparacion de materias primas, la esterilizacion, el cultivo de bacilos, etc. Pak estudio detalladamente los problemas surgidos en la produccion de setas y la operacion de las fabricas.
					
					Todas las unidades de la sociedad deben aprender las experiencias del EPC que eleva el nivel cientifico e intensivo de la produccion de hongos, senalo.
					
					Por ahora, las entidades correspondientes deben estandarizar el diseno de las bases de produccion de hongos, profundizar la investigacion de setas, cultivar muchas cepas madres y suministrarlas, instruyo.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier recorrio varias estaciones del Metro de Pyongyang donde estan impregnadas las imperecederas hazanas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y convoco la reunion consultiva luego de averiguar el estado de operacion y administracion.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para solucionar los problemas que se presentan en la operacion del Metro.

articles.title: Huespedes de OMS visitan varios lugares de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Huespedes de OMS visitan varios lugares de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los participantes en la consulta tecnica de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS) en la region de Sudeste Asiatico sobre el servicio de asistencia medica a larga distancia visitaron el dia 2 el Instituto de Tumor Mamario adscrito a la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang. 
					Los huespedes recorrieron varios lugares del Instituto levantado como moderna base de servicio medico para las mujeres. 
					
					Ellos visitaron tambien el Monumento a la Idea Juche, el Arco de Triunfo y otros lugares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia poderio invencible del PTC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia poderio invencible del PTC
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto un articulo individual dedicado al 39o aniversario de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Aceleremos con vigor la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche mediante la mejora y fortalecimiento radicales del trabajo del partido".
					La nota senala que el Dirigente ya aclaro globalmente la idea y teoria sobre la construccion de un autoctono partido revolucionario y fortalecio el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como invencible organizacion identificada con la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					La unidad monolitica y revolucionaria basada en un centro y una ideologia, es la filosofia politica tomada durante decenios por el PTC como lo mas importante en la revolucion.
					
					En este mundo no hay la organizacion politica igual al PTC que establecio cabalmente el sistema de ideologia unica y el sistema de direccion unica en todo el Partido y ha venido  saliendo victorioso contando con el gran lider y gran dirigente como centro de la unidad y direccion.
					
					La mas solida organizacion pura en lo ideologico, la de integracion organizativa y la organizacion unida en accion, esto es el aspecto  revolucionario del PTC que hoy enaltece al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Todos los miembros del partido se han hecho  baluarte y escudo que defienden a riesgo de vida al Comite Central del PTC siendo camaradas y companeros de armas del Mariscal.
					
					El proyecto y la decision del dirigente sirven de la firme voluntad y la guia de accion de todas las organizaciones del partido y sus militantes.
					
					En todo el partido se han establecido cabalmente el firme caracter organizativo  y la disciplina estricta y todas las organizaciones del partido y militantes piensan y actuan solo segun la idea y voluntad del dirigente, lo que es el aspecto verdadero del PTC.
					
					Como hemos venido luchando con dinamismo tomando como maximo programa del partido la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo, en el futuro tambien desplegaremos la lucha por transformar toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					Esto es la ferrea conviccion de todos los militantes del partido, uniformados y civiles de  de Corea.
